00053 
00054 void MSD_execNameSaveSolid(void)
00055 {
00056    char oname[30], fname[30];
00057 
00058    while (2 != sscanf(restbuf, "%s %s", oname, fname))
00059    {
00060       printf("SaveSolid: objeto arquivo\n");
00061       if (!lineins("? "))
00062       {
00063          return;
00064       }
00065    }
00066    MSD_highNameSaveSolid(oname, fname);
00067 }
00068 
00069 int MSD_highNameSaveSolid(char *oname, char *fname)
00070 {
00071    Id sn;
00072 
00073    if ((sn = MSD_getSolidIdFromName(oname)) == -1)
00074    {
00075       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NaoEncontrouSolidNome, NAM_SaveSolido, oname);
00076       return(FALSE);
00077    }
00078    if (!MSD_highSaveSolid(sn, fname))
00079    {
00080       return(FALSE);
00081    }
00082    strcpy(SolName(MSD_getSolid(sn)), oname);
00083    return(TRUE);
00084 }
00085 
00086 #ifdef __Extended_Version
00087 void MSD_execSaveSolid(void)
00088 {
00089    char fname[30];
00090    int  sn;
00091 
00092    while (2 != sscanf(restbuf, "%d %s", &sn, fname))
00093    {
00094       printf("SaveSolid: sn arquivo\n");
00095       if (!lineins("? "))
00096       {
00097          return;
00098       }
00099    }
00100    MSD_highSaveSolid(sn, fname);
00101 }
00102 
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 int MSD_highSaveSolid(int sn, char *fname)
00106 {
00107    SPTYPE s;
00108 
00109    if ((s = MSD_getSolid(sn)) == SNIL)
00110    {
00111       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NaoEncontrouSolido, NAM_SaveSolido, sn);
00112       return(FALSE);
00113    }
00114    return(MSD_lowSaveSolid(s, fname));
00115 }
00116 
00117 int MSD_lowSaveSolid(SPTYPE s, char *fname)
00118 {
00119    PEulerOp StartOp;
00120    PEulerOp op;
00121    Id       sn;
00122    int      cont;
00123    FILE     *arq;
00124 
00125    if ((arq = fopen(fname, "w")) == (FILE *)NIL)
00126    {
00127       fprintf(stderr, MEN_NaoAbriuArquivo, NAM_SaveSolido, fname);
00128       return(FALSE);
00129    }
00130 
00131    sn           = SolSolidNo(s);
00132    StartOp      = OpHead;
00133    Gdoinversion = TRUE;
00134    Gdodirect    = FALSE;
00135    MSD_lowSoftRemove(s);
00136    Gdoinversion = FALSE;
00137 
00138    for (op = OpHead; op != StartOp; EulerOpNext(op))
00139    {
00140       MSD_lowPrintEulerOp(arq, EULEROPS(op));
00141    }
00142 
00143    if ((s = MSD_lowApplyEulerOp(EULEROPS(OpHead), &cont)) != SNIL)
00144    {
00145       op = OpHead;
00146       for (EulerOpNext(op); op != StartOp; EulerOpNext(op))
00147       {
00148          MSD_lowApplyEulerOp(EULEROPS(op), &cont);
00149       }
00150       SolSolidNo(s) = sn;
00151       MSD_lowSetNormal(s, TRUE);
00152       MSD_lowSetEdgeAngle(s);
00153       MSD_lowSetInfo(s);
00154    }
00155    MSD_lowFreeUndoLog(StartOp);
00156    Gdodirect = TRUE;
00157    fclose(arq);
00158    return(TRUE);
00159 }
